de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database

Class DbGatewayInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbObject
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbGatewayInstance

  • public class DbGatewayInstance
extends DbObject
    This class is the representation of a gateway instance in the database. It provides the functionality to create a new gateway instance or get/set their state.

      • createNewGatewayInstance

        public void createNewGatewayInstance(int controlNodeInstance_id,
                            java.lang.String type,
                            java.lang.String state)
        This method creates and saves a new gateway instance to the database.
        Parameters:
        controlNodeInstance_id - This is the database ID of a controlNode instance.
        type - This is the desirable type of the gateway instance.
        state - This is the desirable state of the gateway instance.

      • setState

        public void setState(int id,
            java.lang.String state)
        This method sets the state of a gateway to a desirable one.
        Parameters:
        id - This is the database ID of a gateway instance.
        state - this is the desirable state of the gateway instance.
